name: Super Micro World
description:
All of your favorite GameBoy cartridges seem to have gotten mixed up! When ever you play one, it looks like it mixed with your other games! Even worse, once you start one you get trapped inside until you beat the level. Hopefully you can escape!

This game was submitted for the Summer Slow Jams Game Jam in July 2021 with PIGSquad!
